data.comment: Sporting kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Farense.
In the minute 5, Andre Narciso signals a Farense throw-in in Sporting's half.
Farense's Ryan Gauld gets in a shot on goal at Jose Alvalade. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 7, Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Farense.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Andre Narciso awards Sporting a goal kick.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Farense to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
In the minute 12, Fabricio Isidoro (Farense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Claudio Falcao (Farense) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 15, Throw-in Farense.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a Sporting throw-in in Farense's half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Farense.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Farense at Jose Alvalade.
In the minute 20, Farense's Hugo Seco has run offside.
Free kick Sporting.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 22, Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 24, Sporting drive upfield and Nuno Mendes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Farense defender.
Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
In the minute 26, Farense have a goal kick.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tiago Tomas is booked for the home team.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Farense in the half of Sporting.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
In the minute 30, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense just outside Sporting's area.
Ryan Gauld (Farense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Sporting.
In Lisbon, Sebastian Coates (Sporting) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 36, Rafael Defendi (Farense) gets a yellow card.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 38, Sporting's Joao Palhinha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Farense defender.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Andre Narciso signals a Farense throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Throw-in Farense.
In the minute 41, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense.
At Jose Alvalade, Joao Palhinha has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Lisbon to check on Patrick, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 43, Farense's Patrick looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabricio Isidoro (Farense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Lisbon.
Farense pushes forward through Ryan Gauld, whose finish on goal is saved.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 45, Tiago Tomas (Sporting) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Farense kick-off.
Throw-in Sporting.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 48, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Farense have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
Andre Narciso awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Pedro Goncalves of Sporting smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andre Narciso awards Sporting a goal kick.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Free kick for Farense in the half of Sporting.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Ruben Amorim is making the team's first substitution at Jose Alvalade with Bruno Tabata replacing Nuno Mendes.
In Lisbon Farense attack through Ryan Gauld. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
In the minute 58, Free kick Sporting.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 60, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
In the minute 61, Farense needs to be cautious. Sporting have an attacking throw-in.
Sporting are pushing forward but Tiago Tomas's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 62, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Patrick for Farense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sporting have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, In Lisbon, Joao Palhinha of Sporting is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In Lisbon Sporting's Tiago Tomas is caught offside.
In the minute 66, Sporting to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Sporting are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sebastian Coates (Sporting) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 69, Bruno Tabata of Sporting gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Farense at Jose Alvalade.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Patrick for Farense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 71, Nikola Stojiljkovic (Farense) has replaced the possibly injured Patrick at Jose Alvalade.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sporting surge into the attack at Jose Alvalade but Tiago Tomas’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Farense.
Andre Narciso signals a Farense throw-in in Sporting's half.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 75, Fabio Nunes for Farense has been booked by Andre Narciso and receives a first yellow card.
Farense to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Farense at Jose Alvalade.
Free kick in a good position for Farense!
The away team replace Hugo Seco with Brian Mansilla.
Can Farense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
In the minute 79, Sergio Vieira (Farense) is making a third substitution, with Eduardo Mancha replacing Bilel Aouacheria.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting make their second substitution with Andraz Sporar replacing Joao Mario.
In the minute 80, Gonzalo Plata is on a sub for Luis Neto for Sporting.
Important block from the Farense defence as Joao Palhinha fires in a strike for Sporting.
In the minute 81, Sporting have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Sporting push forward at Jose Alvalade and Pedro Goncalves gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Farense defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
In the minute 82, Andre Narciso signals a Farense throw-in in Sporting's half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Farense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sporting.
In the minute 83, Eduardo Mancha (Farense) gets a yellow card.
Nuno Santos (Sporting) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Farense have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sporting close to the penalty box.
Sporting have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 87, At Jose Alvalade, Rafael Defendi has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Zouhair Feddal.
Zouhair Feddal returns to the field for Sporting after picking up a slight injury.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Bruno Tabata gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sporting.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
The away team have replaced Filipe Melo with Hugo Marques. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sergio Vieira.
Alex Pinto is replacing Amine Oudrhiri for Farense at Jose Alvalade.
Andraz Sporar smashes in a penalty at Jose Alvalade. The score is now 1-0.
Ruben Amorim (Sporting) is making a fourth substitution, with Goncalo Inacio replacing Tiago Tomas.
Matheus Nunes is replacing Pedro Goncalves for the home team.
